TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, OrdinaryKerman said:
> 
> 
> Why do the [@Jebediah Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/109744-jebediah-kerman/) [@Bill Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127154-bill-kerman/) [@Bob Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127156-bob-kerman/) [@Gene Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129081-gene-kerman/) [@Wernher von Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129085-wernher-von-kerman/) test accounts have such high rep? Also why do they have high user numbers despite being created before [@aLeXmOrA](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/3-alexmora/)'s account (which appears to be the first legit account)
> 

Some of those accounts had artificially inflated post counts and reputation so that, e.g., Jebediah Kerman wasn't called a "newbie" or whatever the forum called brand new members in the beginning.
Are moderators payed?

> 
> 
> 35 minutes ago, Stormpilot said:
> 
> 
> Are moderators payed?
> 

No. We offer our time, service, and talents to the forum community for free. We are regular forum members, just like you. We have accepted a layer of responsibility to provide gentle nudges to keep the forum running smoothly. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
is there a thread where you can ask for something and you get redirected to another thread?

like you say for example:''is there a thread about writing configs?'' and then the owner or others link a thread with that topic

Hi its me doodles, I lost my account for some weird reason. I don't know how, but it's gone... can we fix this up somehow?

[@The Doodling Astronaut2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/211250-the-doodling-astronaut2/) Hey! could you please contact the support team sending an email here: [\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) ? Thanks!

I have a question after reading the page : How do you become a moderator?

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Weak Player said:
> 
> 
> I have a question after reading the page : How do you become a moderator?
> 

Sometimes we invite applications, and sometimes we just invite someone we think would make a good moderator. We look for people who are helpful on the forum and good written communicators. We're not looking to add to the team right now, though.
ok [@Vanamonde](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/27914-vanamonde/)
When was the KSP Forums first created?
Nobody currently on the team was here then but it was around June of 2011.
